md:
giải nghĩa từ "destroying" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Destroying (verb) : phá hủy, hủy diệt
	+ Meaning: to cause something to be completely damaged or ruined
	+ Example: The fire was destroying the entire building.
	+ Related words: destroy, destruction, destructive

* Destroying (present participle of destroy) : đang phá hủy, đang hủy diệt
	+ Meaning: in the process of causing something to be completely damaged or ruined
	+ Example: The storm is destroying the crops.
	+ Related words: destroy, destruction, destructive

* Destroying (gerund) : sự phá hủy, sự hủy diệt
	+ Meaning: the act of causing something to be completely damaged or ruined
	+ Example: The destroying of the old building was a necessary step in the renovation process.
	+ Related words: destroy, destruction, destructive
html:
giải nghĩa từ "destroying" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Destroying (present participle of destroy) : đang phá hủy, đang hủy diệt

    • Meaning: in the process of causing something to be completely damaged or ruined
    • Example: The storm is destroying the crops.
    • Related words: destroy, destruction, destructive

  • Destroying (gerund) : sự phá hủy, sự hủy diệt

    • Meaning: the act of causing something to be completely damaged or ruined
    • Example: The destroying of the old building was a necessary step in the renovation process.
